thread.title: Build and Mount Your Own Floating Shelves for About Seven Bucks
thread.title_full: Build and Mount Your Own Floating Shelves for About Seven Bucks

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Build and Mount Your Own Floating Shelves for About Seven Bucks
text:
Floating shelves are a great way to add some shelving to your house without taking up a ton of space. YouTuber DIY Creators shows off how to build one for about seven dollars. Advertisement 
This is one of the easier projects to do and doesn’t require much in the way of power tools. Really, it’s just locking four pieces of lumber together with glue and dowels, painting, then mounting to your wall. Since it’s made from just a small bit of wood, it’s also super cheap. You’ll find a list of everything you’ll need over on YouTube.
